description: Look for freshly smoked, rather than vacuum-packed, trout.
name: 5-minute Trout Pâté Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 handful fresh dill (plus more for topping)

recipeInstructions.text: Whiz a couple of smoked trout fillets with some Greek yogurt and a spoonful of cream cheese, taste, then add a little lemon juice, a teaspoon of creamed horseradish, and a handful of fresh dill and whiz again.
Add plenty of freshly ground black pepper, and spoon into individual ramekins. Top with a sprig of fresh dill, and serve with ready-made Melba toast.
